ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the attitude quaternions of Interball-Tail allowing the conversion of any vector from the satellite body-build frame to GEI-1950 frame.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Q0 Attitude quaternion SC to GEI transformation
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Q0 = cos(ALPHA/2) The attitude quaternion describes a transformation of a vector from spacecraft body coordinates into the GEI-1950 (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system. It represents a rotation of an ALPHA angle around an axis whose the unit vector coordinates are U, V, W.

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Q1 Attitude quaternion SC to GEI transformation
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Q1=U*sin(ALPHA/2) The attitude quaternion describes a transformation of a vector from spacecraft body coordinates into the GEI-1950 (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system. It represents a rotation of an ALPHA angle around an axis whose the unit vector coordinates are U, V, W.

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Q2 Attitude quaternion SC to GEI transformation
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Q2 = V*sin(ALPHA/2) The attitude quaternion describes a transformation of a vector from spacecraft body coordinates into the GEI-1950 (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system. It represents a rotation of an ALPHA angle around an axis whose the unit vector coordinates are U, V, W.

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Q3 Attitude quaternion SC to GEI transformation
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Q3 = W*sin(ALPHA/2)The attitude quaternion describes a transformation of a vector from spacecraft body coordinates into the GEI-1950 (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system. It represents a rotation of an ALPHA angle around an axis whose the unit vector coordinates are U, V, W.

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Right ascension of the spin axis in GEI coordinate system
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Right ascension of the spin axis in GEI (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Declination of the spin axis in GEI coordinate system
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Declination of the spin axis in GEI (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Right ascension of the spin axis in GSE coordinate system
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Right ascension of the spin axis in GSE (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system

Parameter.Name: INT_TAIL Declination of the spin axis in GSE coordinate system
Parameter.Description: INT_TAIL Declination of the spin axis in GSE (Geocentric Equatorial Inertial) coordinate system
